/contentTypes.description: Provides operations to manage the contentTypes property of the microsoft.graph.list entity.

get.description: Get the collection of [contentType][contentType] resources in a [list][].

post.summary: Create new navigation property to contentTypes for drives

/contentTypes/$count.description: Provides operations to count the resources in the collection.

get.summary: Get the number of the resource

/contentTypes/addCopy.description: Provides operations to call the addCopy method.

post.description: Add a copy of a [content type][contentType] from a [site][site] to a [list][list].

/contentTypes/addCopyFromContentTypeHub.description: Provides operations to call the addCopyFromContentTypeHub method.

post.description: Add or sync a copy of a published content type from the content type hub to a target site or a list. This method is part of the content type publishing changes to optimize the syncing of published content types to sites and lists, effectively switching from a 'push everywhere' to 'pull as needed' approach. The method allows users to pull content types directly from the content type hub to a site or list. For more information, see contentType: getCompatibleHubContentTypes and the blog post Syntex Product Updates – August 2021.

/contentTypes/getCompatibleHubContentTyp.description: Provides operations to call the getCompatibleHubContentTypes method.
